title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description: Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, it is not selectable on the first try. Only after making a second attempt, the item can be selected.
OB: When I try to select an item in the library outline view, it doesn't get selected on the first attempt.
EB: After making a second attempt to select the item, it gets selected successfully.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Try to select the label item.
4. Notice that the item is not selected on the first attempt.
5. Make a second attempt to select the item and observe that it can be selected.
